title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add guanciale and cook until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with guanciale.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka paste for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Cook marinated chicken until golden, about 6-8 minutes. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, cook onions until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic, ginger, and remaining tikka paste. Cook for 1 minute.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and return chicken to pan.
Simmer for 5 more minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious beef tacos with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and a spicy sauce.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water according to package directions.
Simmer for 5-10 minutes until mixture thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with beef mixture.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and onions.
Serve with sour cream and salsa on the side.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add lemon juice and mix well.
Top with Parmesan cheese and croutons.
Add anchovy fillets if desired.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake with chocolate frosting and chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease two 9-inch round pans.
In a large bowl, mix flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat eggs, buttermilk, coffee, and oil.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Divide batter between prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until toothpick comes out clean.
Cool completely before frosting.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Fresh salmon grilled to perfection with herbs and lemon butter sauce.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 4-6 minutes per side until cooked through.
In a small saucepan, melt butter with garlic, lemon juice, and zest.
Stir in fresh herbs.
Serve salmon topped with lemon butter sauce.
